name: Budapest Hikers
about:
Budapest Hikers is for those who like : Budapest, the forests and having fun :)
Feel free to join us!
Let's discover Hungary and its Beauty !

posts.message: They are a bunch of amazing sport loving people! We highly recommend to join them üòâ

posts.message: Check them out if you are in Prague ;) Filip Novak is doing such an amazing job as your guide through the Czech forests !

posts.message:
It was great to meet you all at our very first hike in B√ºkk!
Special thanks to Petrovics NG photo alias Angelina Petrovics ‚Äôthe EYE' who took amazing pictures during the hike and to Eszter Kecsk√©s D, who helped us to keep the group together. 
Feel free to tag yourself in the picture! üòâ 
We look forward to seeing you again!
Love,
The Budapest Hikers Team

posts.message: Less than two weeks left! Don't miss the opportunity to see the startlingy green trails of B≈±kk and Hungary's biggest waterfall with like-minded, awesome people like yourself: http://bit.ly/hellobukk

posts.story: Budapest Hikers added 2 new photos to the album: Trial hikes ‚Äî with Jamie Murphy and √Ågnes Kecsk√©s D.

posts.message:
TrialhikeON! ‚ù§Ô∏è Jamie is using his time on the coach to B√ºkk to study Hungarian and it seems the trial hike was destined to be on this day. üò±
The text translated means:
-what are you doing this weekend?
-on Sunday I am going for a hike.
-where?
-to B√ºkk! ‚ù§Ô∏è‚ù§Ô∏è‚ù§Ô∏è

See what Hungary has to offer outside the city streets of Budapest. Come & explore beautiful B√ºkk, feast your eyes on caves & a waterfall! All while being healthy, active and meeting awesome new people!
Sometimes it can be hard to find the ONE. Weighing up your options can be tough. Here are some things you should consider to choose the right pair of hiking shoes.

Here is the link to reserve an amazing Saturday at B√ºkk. Spend the whole day in the nature seeing waterfalls, caves & more whilst enjoying likeminded awesome people's company: http://bit.ly/hellobukk

Budapest Hikers are finally exploring the scenic region of B√ºkk!
Book your place on our website (tickets: http://bit.ly/hellobukk) and join the Facebook Event to stay up to date with the latest information

https://www.facebook.com/events/227965300901959/

Unfortunately the weather gods have decided to punish Budapest with rain and thunderstorms this weekend. 

Unless any of you know a reliable weather dance, have some sheep or someone of pure innocence thay you're willing to sacrifice we regret to have to cancel the activity day on Saturday. 

Don't forget that yesterday was international running day. This was the whole inspiration for our event so please don't forget to be active in some way this week and stay healthy.
Hard to decide, right? There is only one way to find out ;) Come & Join : https://www.facebook.com/events/595707710595885/

Only a bit more than a week left! We are looking forward to seeing you at Margitsziget!
Application here: http://budapesthikers.com/activity-day/

extra FITNESS INSTRUCTOR needed ;)
More information to the job here :)
http://www.bootcampclubbudapest.com/jobs

In honour of International running day, join our Activity Day on 4th June.
If you don‚Äôt, here are a few things you'll miss:
-ultimate Frisbee
-football
-tug of war
-team building games
-fun
-bootcamp training
Let us know you're coming: http://budapesthikers.com/activity-day/
https://www.facebook.com/events/595707710595885/

events.name: Budapest Hikers: 10th Hike - HelloB√ºkk
events.description:
Hello Hikers! We are happy to announce our very first hike to the beautiful area of B√ºkk. 

B√ºkk is full of jaw dropping natural wonders such as waterfalls, caves & amazing scenery so we're pretty excited to explore with you.

We're still planning the details so we will update you very soon. For now, keep your calender free on 28th May for your next Budapest Hikers event ;)

#Application:
Tickets are coming soon!

#Meeting point: 8h30‚Äì √öjpest-V√°roskapu
Length: 18 km
Difficulty: intermediate

#Hike Milestones

Szilv√°sv√°rad - The city of the most ancient trout

F√°tyolv√≠zes√©s - We will stop here for lunch to try the famous trout. Of course of course, if you don't like fish, we are not going to force you to eat it :D A stunning series of Waterfalls that are almost worth the trip on their own. http://elmenyekvolgye.hu/images/elmenypont/96-fatyol-vizeses/galeria/fatyol_vizeses_000.jpg

Szalajka forr√°s (Szalajka source)
Its drainage basin is more than 10 km¬≤. Most of its water probably comes form a undiscovered cave system in B√ºkk.

Ist√°ll√≥s k≈ë - The first of two caves in our Hike.  Emerged along a geological fault line. It used to function as a barn. https://upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/3/30/Ist%C3%A1ll%C3%B3s-k%C5%91-barlang.jpg/1024px-Ist%C3%A1ll%C3%B3s-k%C5%91-barlang.jpg

Cserepes k≈ë - In the middle of B√ºkk, near to the blue tour, we can visit this cave which also works as a "hostel" for hikers: http://www.cserepesko.eoldal.hu/img/original/353/2010_003.jpg

events.name: AFTER party - Budapest Hikers: Spring Activity retreat
events.description:
AFTER party is a part of the Budapest Hikers Acitvity retreat programs. 

https://www.facebook.com/events/162063184164877/
Book here: tr.im/budapesthikersafterparty

On the evening of 23rd April, after experiencing the magnificent, eye opening view from atop the highest point of Hungary the Activity Retreat will turn to fun and games. 

# The ascent of knowledge is a fun but challenging team quiz consisting of hiking trivia, general knowledge & a music round! 

# There will be plenty of opportunity to tell stories, meet new people and drink around the camp fire. Please come prepared with palinka (or drinks of your choice) and join in.

events.name: Budapest Hikers: Spring Activity retreat
events.description:
UPDATE!
Hey guys! Meeting point on Saturday :
7AM at √öjpest-v√°roskapu in front of the CBA shop. See you soon!
My number: +36 30 753 4686 
Email: info@budapesthikers.com

Budapest Hikers Activity camp

Dear hikers and soon-to-be hikers. What could be better than one day of hiking with Budapest Hikers? 2 days of hiking with a camp of course! 

For the first time we are offering an overnight event which will include comfortable, warm indoor accommodation, 3 different levels of hike to accommodate all levels of hikers. 

On April 23rd join us for a 2 two day extravaganza containing nature, good company and lots of fun & games.

There are three types of accomodation available and therefore two prices. We have limited space available in Wooden huts with standard beds and a private toilet for each hut and then other rooms available in the Motel with bunk beds. Finally if you wish to bring your own camping gear you can sleep outdoors and gaze up at the stars.

#Price:

1. tent - 16500
2. motel - 17500
3. wooden house - 18500


All prices include transport, hikes, accommodation, breakfast and fun & games.

Itinerary:

3 Hikes! 
1. option
level: advanced
length: 25 km
milestones:
M√°traf√ºred
M√°trah√°za
K√©kestet≈ë (1014 m)
M√°tra-nyereg
Cs√≥r-hegy
Galya-tet≈ë (965 m)
M√°tra-nyereg
Join us: https://www.facebook.com/events/880042948771466/

2. option
level: intermadeiate
length: 15 km
Milestones:
M√°trah√°za
K√©kestet≈ë
Benev√°r
M√°traf√ºred
M√°trah√°za
Join us: https://www.facebook.com/events/534080750109795/

3. option: 
level: short, but tough
length: 7 km
You go directly to M√°trah√°za, then you walk till K√©kestet≈ë and wait for us to arrive. During your stay you can enjoy the beautiful view and the nature. After we arrived, you will have the possibility to go back to the camp to play games and have fun with other like-minded nature lovers.
Join us: https://www.facebook.com/events/1709999919269290/

After the hikes we will have some fun and games followed by some traditional Hungarian food before sharing drinks with each other. 

On the 24th we will:
You can choose from several options:
-Wellness (swimming pool, sauna)
-games with other hikers
-relaxing in the beautiful nature

We anticipate tickets to go quickly so get yours early to ensure that you don't miss out as there are only 100 spaces and once they're gone, they're gone! 

See you soon, hikers!

events.name: Budapest Hikers: 9th Hike - MarchHike
events.description:
#Application:
Buy your ticket on our website: http://bit.ly/budapesthikers-march-2016-hike

#Details:
Meeting point: 7h15 ‚Äì √öjpest-V√°roskapu
Length: 20 km
Difficulty: intermediate

At Nagyb√∂rzs√∂ny we are taking a lovely, old-fashioned,  small train for 4 beautiful km. Then we start walking to the top of the big cold Mountain. There you will think that you saw all the nature's beauty but the main attraction is just coming. After having lunch, we will be heading forward to Cs√≥v√°nyos which is the second highest point of Hungary standing 938m high. 
What do you say? Fancy for the next Budapest Hikers adventure? 

#Price:
6990 HUF: food, small train, train museum ticket, transportation
5490 HUF: NO food, small train, train museum ticket, transportation

#Milestones:
Nagyb√∂rzs√∂ny
Nagy-Hideghegy
Cs√≥v√°nyos
Kisin√≥ci hut

Reasons to join:
because this event is awesome
because you are awesome
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=nCthQ1eNrvk

Feel free to invite your friends, don‚Äôt forget, THE MORE THE MERRIER !!

PS.: In case of bad weather, the event is cancelled and we will refund your money.

events.name: Budapest Hikers: 7th Hike - WinterHikeInB√∂rzs√∂ny
events.description:
Hello Hikers !
This is our 7th event and our very first winter hike. The destination is B√∂rzs√∂ny.
#Fee: 3.500 HUF (2.500 HUF for the transport and 1.000 HUF for the organization)

It is an amazing tour on a giant volcano. Yes this area and the Pilis Mountains used to be one huge volcanic ridge 10 million years ago.
#Application:
Please fill out this application form to make easier the organizer work :)
